1.3.2.name: wordpress/baw-login-logout-menu
1.3.2.description: With this plugin you can now add a real log in/logout item menu with autoswitch when user is logged in or not. Nonce token is present on logout item. 2 titles, one for 'log in' and one for 'logout' can be set up. Also, you can set the redirecion page you want, just awesome.
